quotes.content: The first mountain is about building up the ego and defining yourself and success. The second mountain is about shedding the ego and losing yourself in service to others.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.content: Joy is not a light emotion. It's the serious response to seeing people as they are, not as you want them to be.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.content: The people on the second mountain have been transformed. They are deeply committed. The outpouring is a response to some gift they have received.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.content: Practice isn't the thing you do once you're good. It's the thing you do that makes you good.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: The key to good decision making is not knowledge. It is understanding. We are swimming in the former. We are desperately lacking in the latter.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: Achievement is talent plus preparation.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: We learn by example and by direct experience because there are real limits to the adequacy of verbal instruction.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: Hard work is a prison sentence only if it does not have meaning.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: Success is not a random act. It arises out of a predictable and powerful set of circumstances and opportunities.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: Who we are cannot be separated from where we're from.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: The tipping point is that magic moment when an idea, trend, or social behavior crosses a threshold, tips, and spreads like wildfire.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.content: The real work of a life is to make commitments to people, places, and causes, and live them out faithfully.
quotes.author: David Brooks

quotes.content: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.content: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.content: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.content: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.content: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.content: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.content: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.content: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.content: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.content: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.content: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.content: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.content: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.content: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.content: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.content: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

quotes.content: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.content: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.content: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.content: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.content: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.content: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.content: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.content: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.content: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
quotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt

quotes.content: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.content: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

quotes.content: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.content: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.content: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.content: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.content: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.content: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.content: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.content: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.content: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.content: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.content: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.content: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.content: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.content: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.content: Your limitationâ€”it's only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Little things make big days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.content: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.content: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
quotes.author: Michael John Bobak

quotes.content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.content: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.content: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.content: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.content: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.content: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.content: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.content: What's the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.content: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.content: Nothing in the world can take the place of Persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.content: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.content: Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.
quotes.author: Theodore N. Vail

quotes.content: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.content: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.content: I failed my way to success.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.content: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley
